'''Hydro Mimic Crabs''' are [[Hydro Mimics]] summoned by the [[Oceanid]], but can also be encountered on their own in the [[Spiral Abyss]] or during [[Quests]]. They resemble giant [[Crab]]s. They take more damage from {{Cryo}} (except in certain events; see [[#Event|below]]).

===Event===
The event version is used in [[Wishful Drops]], [[Legend of the Vagabond Sword]], and certain iterations of the [[Spiral Abyss]].
{{Enemy Stats
|hydro_res    = Immune
|hp_ratio     = 0.6
|atk_ratio    = 2
|hp_type      = 1
}}

==Abilities and Attacks==
*'''Bubble Spray:''' Walks sideways while spitting a stream of water bubbles at the player, dealing '''10% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DoT}}. They will occasionally stop moving to rest, allowing them to be hit more easily in this state.
